song_lyrics: bhagatinā emā bhariyā chhe bhandār re... 1
panḍit pothā ene paḍe chhe pāy re... 2
Nav jo ūge ne nav āthme,
nav āpe e bapore ūno tāp re... 3
bhāḷtā ene bhav andhārā jāy re... 4
bhāṇ betho mārā rudiyānī mojhār re... 5
title: Sorathno sūraj ajvāḷā āpe chhe Bhārat bhomne

metadata.kirtan_info:
1-971: Kaag Bapu

Category: Yogiji Maharajna Pad
